data.title: 3½ hours from Stockholm
data.meta_description: Find cities within a 3½ hours radius of me in Stockholm and look for places to visit within a 3.5 hours drive.
data.text:
Places to visit about 3½ hours from Stockholm

Cities 3½ hours from Stockholm

These are approximate driving times in a radius from Stockholm, Sweden. Search for vacation spots within driving distance for a day trip or weekend getaway. There are many towns within the total area, so if you're looking for closer places, try a smaller radius like 3 hours. If you're willing to drive farther, try 4 hours.

Not sure where to go? Take a day trip from Stockholm, or if you have more time you can explore weekend trips from Stockholm, but make sure you also check road conditions around Stockholm. Looking for small towns or communities around Stockholm, Sweden? Get a full list of up to 500 cities nearby Stockholm.

Change your settings:

from

More cities around 3½ hours away by plane

Here are more cities based on a flight circle radius of 3.5 hours. These cities are much further than the ones above since now we're looking at a 3½ hour flight.
